name: Facility Confirming Design Layout Report Date
title: FCDLRD
definition: Identifies the date that the Confirming Design Layout Report (CDLR) is to be received at the provider design control office for the trunk facility.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

usageNotes: Required when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N”, the FCKT field is populated, the RT field is “F” and the customer has requested a CDLR.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B” or “S”.
